    • Method Detail

      • sortUniqueStringsByEmbeddedIntegers

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> sortUniqueStringsByEmbeddedIntegers(java.util.List<java.lang.String> strings)
        sorts unique strings by embedded integers. the rest of the string is expected to be a constant framework. e.g. foo1bar, foo11bar, foo2bar is reordered to e.g. foo1bar, foo2bar, foo11bar if any string does not fit the regex pattern and constantFramework returns empty list.
        Parameters:
        strings -
        Returns:
        list of sorted strings (empty if any conditions are violated)

      • getEmbeddedInteger

        public static java.lang.Integer getEmbeddedInteger(java.lang.String string)
        extracts positive number embedded in String. Examples foo1234 foo1234pugh.bar 1234bar.plugh but not foo12bar34.plugh foo-1234-bar gives +1234
        Parameters:
        string -
        Returns:
        number or null;

      • addPaddedSpaces

        public static java.lang.String addPaddedSpaces(java.lang.String s,
                                               int totalLength)
        rightpads string to totalLength usingspaces if s >= totalLength no action
        Parameters:
        s -
        totalLength -
        Returns:
